ing: 2 tablespoons whipped cream, or to taste
n: Quick and Easy Pumpkin Pie Milkshake
des: "This outrageously delicious pie-shake combines your Thanksgiving favorite, pumpkin pie, with plenty of vanilla ice cream, ice cold milk, and a shot of bourbon to become a tall glass of pumpkin spice heaven. Top this crazy shake with too much whipped cream and a small sliver of pumpkin pie for dunking!"
ins:
Place pumpkin pie in a blender. Add ice cream, bourbon, 1/4 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, and whole milk. Blend milkshakes until smooth.
Pour milkshakes into 2 glasses; top with whipped cream and remaining pumpkin pie spice.
